# fileURL

**Instance Property**

The URL of the open file document.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var fileURL: URL?
```

## Getting document properties

- **isEditable**: A Boolean that indicates whether you can edit the document.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether you can edit the document.
items.name: isEditable
